poltergeist.power: Throws all nearby items, creating an EMF Level 3. Nearby players will have their sanity decreased by 2x the number of items thrown.
strength: Manipulate more objects at once than any other Ghost

wraith.power: Teleports to a spot within 3 metres of a random player, creating an Interaction EMF.
strength: Ability to travel through walls and closed doors
weakness: Toxic reaction to salt, will cease attacking immediately upon contact

phantom.power: Navigates to a random player's location, creating an Interaction EMF at the starting location.
strength: Considerably drops player sanity when looked at
Can manifest with the appearance of a player
weakness: Disappears when a photo is taken of it

banshee.power: Navigates directly to its chosen target regardless of the target hiding or breaking line of sight, only switching focus when the target is dead or leaves the building. It will begin a hunt soon after reaching the target.
strength: Focuses on one player at a time until they are dead
weakness: Fears the Crucifix, which boosts the hunt-stopping range from 3m to 5m

jinn.power: Interacts with electronics more than any other ghost. Causes phones to ring, lights to change, radios to activate, TVs to turn on, and car alarms to go off.
strength: Travels at an increasing speed the further away the victim is
weakness: Turning off the power will prevent the Jinn from using its ability

mare.power: Highly aggressive, initiates hunts against low sanity players with very little cooldown in between. Higher chance of hunting in darkness, will turn lights & power off to achieve this.
strength: Increased chance to attack in the dark
weakness: Turning the lights on will lower the attack chance

revenant.power: Does not focus exclusively on a single target, will freely switch when a new target is more convenient.
strength: Travels at a significantly faster speed when hunting a victim
weakness: Hiding will cause it to move very slowly

strength: Shy, will rarely perform actions in the presence of two or more people
weakness: Rarely starts a hunt when players are grouped together

demon.power: Highly aggressive, the most dangerous type of ghost. Will attack often and without warning.
strength: Initiates hunts more frequently than any other ghost
weakness: Asking successful questions on the Ouija Board will not lower the player's sanity

oni.power: Extremely strong, will throw objects around the room with great force.
strength: More active when players are nearby
weakness: The high activity of an Oni makes them easier to find and identify

strength: Has a strong effect on player's sanity
weakness: Using Smudge Sticks on the ghost room will cause it to cease wandering for 90 seconds
